Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.charactercards

Class ProhibitionCharacterCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.charactercards.CharacterCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.charactercards.ProhibitionCharacterCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ProhibitionCharacterCard extends CharacterCard
The ProhibitionCharacterCard class models the character cards whose effect is to add prohibition cards on islands
